install.name: Login Web Server Authentication
install.author: Laurent Opprecht
install.description: This module displays a login link for web server authentication. If the web server provides a user name then the module tries to log in the user.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: username
param.label: User name field name
param.description: The name of the server field used to uniquely name the user.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: The text that appears before the login link.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: The text that appears after the login link.

param.name: displayicon
param.label: Display icon
param.description: If true display an icon link. If false display a text link.

param.name: linktext
param.label: Link text
param.description: The text of the login link.

param.name: name
param.label: Name/Username
param.description: Display either the user name or the full name if greeting is turned on.
